column4: there is one more weird thing happening: whenever I startup I get an Error message "The panel encountered a problem while loading "OAFIID:GENOME_ClockApplet".
i'm starting to think I may have a virus
i would love to, unfortunately my browsers are busted

we.... i'm having some strange issues in ubuntu 8.10 - All of a sudden my firefox 3.0.8 and pidgin 2.5.5 dont work anymore. When I run firefox from command line it says "Couldn't load XPCOM." and when I run pidgin from a command line it says "Segmentation fault"... Anyone have any clues, see this before?
the only thing I did was uninstall Google Earth 4.3 and then install Google Earth 5.0
linux people don't seem to listen sometimes
my browser doesn't work so I can't google the issue
in your home directory pumpkinseed - its hidden
